name: Portainer
description: Powerful Docker management UI. Monitor and manage containers, images, networks, and volumes.
author: StumpfWorks
compose:
version: '3.8'

services:
  portainer:
    image: portainer/portainer-ce:latest
    container_name: portainer
    command: -H unix:///var/run/docker.sock
    ports:
      - 9000:9000
      - 9443:9443
    volumes:
      - /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock
      - {{DATA_PATH}}:/data
    restart: unless-stopped
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=portainer"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=monitoring"

notes: Web UI available at http://your-ip:9000 (HTTP) or https://your-ip:9443 (HTTPS)
First time setup: Create admin user on first access
Portainer requires access to Docker socket
